definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: And they should carry on the self-innovation constantly and pay attention to form the fund brand.
sentences.chinese: 并且要不断进行自我创新，注重打造基金品牌。

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交际法有，过于恰恰相反注重语言在语境中的运用。

sentences.english: Pays great attention to the form in this time poet to be elegant, strives for perfection to the poem skill.
sentences.chinese: 在这个时期诗人注重形式典雅，对诗艺精益求精。

sentences.english: There are also signs that Chinese policymakers are focusing more on shoring up rural infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 还有迹象表明中国的决策者更注重巩固农乡基本产业。

sentences.english: The demonstration was carefully orchestrated to attract maximum publicity.
sentences.chinese: 该示威经过精心策画以尽量吸引公众注重。

sentences.english: Second, he pays little attentation to his cloth, food or other enjoyments but spend much money to buy law books.
sentences.chinese: 还有，他不注重衣食住行，而热衷于购买法律书籍。
但是，招聘人员却非常注重按类别来划分。

sentences.english: Albert enjoys privacy and he tends to do things on the sly.
sentences.chinese: 亚伯特注重隐私，做事总是很神秘。

sentences.english: I appreciate the 'results driven' culture in Sensata.
sentences.chinese: 我非常欣赏森萨塔‘注重成果’的企业文化。

sentences.english: Co-payments should be raised to make patients and their physicians more cost-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 自付额应该提高，使病人和医生更加注重节约成本。

sentences.english: We will attach importance to teachers' professional ethics and moral instruction of children.
sentences.chinese: 注重师德师风建设，加强青少年思想道德教育。

sentences.english: Good business is always about minimizing risks while maximizing your opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 好生意总是注重减少风险，同时你又在扩大着机会。

sentences.english: During the development of the GIRSUN it pay more attention to brand image.
sentences.chinese: 格尚在发展的历程中，更加注重品牌形象的塑造。

sentences.english: Apparently the company also paid attention to the design.
sentences.chinese: 该公司显然也很注重座椅的外观设计。

sentences.english: But if drop, are fine hair and bingle in hair, answer bring to sb's attention.
sentences.chinese: 但假如掉发中有细发和短发，则应引起注重。

sentences.english: I am a perfectionist and I pay ver much attention to details . Sometimes I am quie captious.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个完美型的人，太注重细节，有时有些挑剔。

definition: to attach importance to sth/to value
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to regard as important/to care about
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
prominent/outstanding/to give prominence to/to protrude/to project
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
